name: MySQL_MariaDB_Generic
keywords: Communication, Database, MySQL, MariaDB, Arduino, Teensy, SAMD21, SAMD51, SAM DUE, AVR, Mega, nRF52, W5100, W5200, W5500, ENC28J60 Ethernet shield
description: Connects to MySQL or MariaDB using ESP8266/ESP32, nRF52, SAMD21/SAMD51, STM32F/L/H/G/WB/MP1, Teensy, SAM DUE, Mega, etc. board with W5x00 or ENC28J60 Ethernet or WiFiNINA modules/shields. W5x00 can use Ethernet, EthernetLarge, Ethernet2 or Ethernet3 library. ENC28J60 can use either EthernetENC or UIPEthernet Library
